Introduction To HackSoc@HackSoc TechFest 2015.

October 1, 2015 â€” 19:00

As the President of HackSoc at the University of Nottingham I Introduce new students to hacksoc, the team and the HackSoc TechFest in October 2015. providing an overview of the HackSoc TechFest and the day to come. We we lucky to have filled the room with over 70 attendees for the TechFest and had to split the event over 2 streams!

The slides can be found here.
